articles.author: 8848 社区（8848 Community）
articles.description:
interesting https://twitter.com/forgivenever/status/1640907507341365248

Forgiven: Arbitrum 空投之夜停机之谜
日前主任怒锤一波以太神教只搞迷信,不重视技术,激发了大量声讨,调查结果：
1. 负载最重时,出快正常,但排序器出现问题,性能严重下降,官方RPC和Airdop前端宕机,区块浏览器20mins未更新数据
2. 排序器每秒700万Gas是软限制,之后Gas Price会飙升限流,真实环境极限120～150TPS
articles.title: interesting https://twitter.com/forgivenever/status/1640907507341365248

articles.author: DeFi Educator
articles.description:
Here’s what’s wrong with Capo;
- As a trader strong opinions, should be loosely held. 
- Ask yourself what would I need to see to prove me wrong? 
If you don’t define your invalidation, you’re never wrong. 
Do you want to be right or make money? Can’t do both…

il Capo Of Crypto: Despite all the noise, I know that the vast majority of those who follow me are genuine and good people. And these deserve an update:
This time away from Twitter has been very good and necessary. I'm totally fine, enjoying my personal life. Thank you to everyone who has shown… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1637374540933103617

articles.author: DeFi Educator
articles.description:
If Balajis has a lot of exposure to Bitcoin already, it’s a +EV move to put this bet on and hope it goes viral.
Example. He has 300m in BTC, puts on bet. Because of tweet, people buy Bitcoin moving price up 1%. He pockets $2m.

Balaji: I will take that bet.
You buy 1 BTC.
I will send $1M USD.
This is ~40:1 odds as 1 BTC is worth ~$26k.
The term is 90 days.
All we need is a mutually agreed custodian who will still be there to settle this in the event of digital dollar devaluation.
If someone knows how to do this… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1636797265317867520 https://t.co/6Aav9KeJpe

articles.description:
Should add there's a lot of risks lingering out there, such as
Binance: The CFTC suit was likely the first of what will be many actions against the exchange.
Tether / USDT: They're very likely dealing w/ a similar cast of unsavory characters as Binance. Wouldn't be surprised to… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1641958435930664961

DeFi Surfer: There are many things working in crypto's favor YTD that I worry are fleeting...
- Fed balance sheet expansion;
- Treasury general account (TGA) draining;
- Economic data holding up while inflation declines.
Haven't sold any crypto to be fair but could easily see all three of… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1641952528870019074

articles.author: DeFi Surfer
articles.description:
Assuming crypto continues to be a growing asset class i agree with kaze @coinbase is very well positioned.

kamikaz FIAT: I’d like to say this is super bullish for Coinbase, esp if they’re actually going to launch perps widely outside of US
But if Biden wins 2024 and anti-crypto in US continues, more likely result is other offshore exchanges just pop up take take Binance’s place
articles.title: Assuming crypto continues to be a growing asset class i agree with kaze @coinbase is very well positioned.
